meanings.definition: Complete trust or confidence in someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Her faith in her best friend never wavered.
meanings.sent2: Having faith in oneself is important for success.
meanings.sent3: He put his faith in the talking parrot to keep his secrets.
meanings.sent4: Her faith in the power of kindness was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The old man's faith in the magic of the stars guided his decisions.

meanings.definition: Strong belief in God or in the doctrines of a religion.
meanings.sent1: Their faith in God gave them strength during difficult times.
meanings.sent2: Many find comfort in their faith during times of uncertainty.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's faith in the acorn god was unwavering.
meanings.sent4: Her faith in the divine plan helped her through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The child's faith in the tooth fairy was adorable and innocent.

meanings.sent1: Their faith was based on ancient traditions and rituals.
meanings.sent2: The community shared a common faith in their deity.
meanings.sent3: The cat's faith in the sacredness of nap time was unshakeable.
meanings.sent4: The faith of the villagers was evident in their daily prayers.
meanings.sent5: The tribe's faith in the healing power of nature was passed down for generations.
